fct_reach_description: Build brand awareness, drive customer acquisition and augment your marketing outreach with digital solutions.
fct_engage_description: Build channels of communication with your customers, keep them up-to-date via rich media and understand their preferences through fun and easy interactions
fct_loyalty_description: Build your own multi-currency & multi-tier loyalty program to identify and reward your customers through targeted and personalised benefits, coupons, and experiences.

improve_kpis: Improve your KPIs, Increase Visits and Boost Sales
testimonial1_text: Reliable and Efficient Partner Their team was incredibly responsive and efficient. They handled our complex international shipment with ease, ensuring timely delivery to our clients. We're impressed with their commitment to customer satisfaction and their ability to navigate global  challenges
testimonial2_text: Seamless Global Shipping We've been using their services for years, and they consistently exceed our expectations. Their seamless global shipping solutions have streamlined our supply chain and reduced costs. We highly recommend them to businesses of all sizes
testimonial3_text: Personalized Service and Expertise Their personalized service and expertise in international  are second to none. They took the time to understand our unique needs and provided tailored solutions. Their team is always available to answer our questions and provide updates, giving us peace of mind
testimonial4_text: Efficient and Transparent  Solutions Their efficiency and transparency have set a new standard for us. From managing documents to on-time deliveries, they’ve ensured a smooth experience every step of the way. Their proactive approach has significantly improved our operations.
team_description: We are a diverse and passionate team that takes ownership and empowers you to execute the roadmap. We stay light on our feet and truly enjoy delivering great work.
address: Building: 1320, Rd No 4149, Block: 441, North Sehla, Kingdom of Bahrain
amplify_retention: Amplify Customer Retention & Engagement and Create a Stellar Value Proposition with our Robust Gen Next Loyalty Program
learn_more: Learn More About How We Can Help You
analytics_description: We collect, process and analyze customer interaction and transaction data to extract meaningful and actionable insights. It helps you optimize and curate communication, marketing strategies, and your loyalty program.
communication_strategy: Communication Strategy Analysis across FCT channels
loyalty_affinity: Customer Loyalty and Brand Affinity Analysis
marketing_description: Unifynd’s Marketing suite creates a seamless and rewarding customer experience across their shopping journey and beyond with its robust strategy.
campaign_deployment: Deployment of various loyalty program campaigns via multiple communication channels.
omnichannel_strategy: Create an omnichannel marketing strategy that seamlessly connects customers at varied touchpoints to provide an engaging shopping experience.
acquisition_plans: Ideate & implement acquisition-driven plans to build a user base and understand customer behavioral patterns.
timely_campaigns: Execute timely campaigns to secure customer engagement and retention.
measure_optimize: Measure, optimize, and revisit KPIs to refine marketing efforts.
retailer_collaboration: Collaborate and partner with retailers to deploy personalized marketing strategies.
